Partial demolition of existing conservatory to form a single storey rear extension. Alterations to fenestrations and addition of a first floor window on flank elevation, rooflights to front and side roofslopes? to allow amended footprint of single storey rear extension, omission of rooflights, amended location of rooflight and additional window to side elevation--- Status: REC--- Decision: --- Date Decision Issued: ---

description: Non-material amendment to planning permission DM2023/00110 which allowed the 'Erection of a first floor front/side extension and alterations to existing porch. Partial demolition of existing conservatory to form a single storey rear extension. Alterations to fenestrations and addition of a first floor window on flank elevation, rooflights to front and side roofslopes.' to allow changes to footprint of the single storey rear extension, omission of front rooflights, reposition of ground floor rooflights and addition of ground floor window to side elevation.
decision_conditions: Pursuant to The Town and Country Planning (General Development Procedure) (amendment No 3) (England) Order 2009, the revisions as detailed in Supporting document - Example of similar development at 128 Burdon Lane, Cheam, Site Plan - 124 Burdon Lane, Cheam SM2 7DA, 1005 Rev E, 1010 Rev G, 1012 Rev G, 1015 Rev G, Cover letter - S96A at 124 Burdon Lane (30.5.2025) and DN DM2023/00110 (GRANT_HHA) are considered not to be materially different from the approved plans and may therefore be implemented without the need for further planning permission.
